config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used in the code to set the number of photons for InstantGI. It retrieves the value from the 'options' object using getInt() method.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is triggered when InstantGI is initialized, which happens once during the system startup or whenever InstantGI is created.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The value set for 'gi.igi.samples' configuration impacts the quality of global illumination in the system. A higher value may result in better quality but also increase computation time and memory usage.
